Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: A new example of the numerous oval-shaped jars of Mirgissa/Iken. As opposed to the others, this one shows an unbalanced axis and the ovious absence of a lip. However, the neck is decorated with the usual impressed spiral motif. The clay is common, orange and has been polished.
